comment.author: 9019841@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Orthodox Church Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 49388331@N06
comment._content: this church is called Agios Sostis (salvation) and is located in Sygroy Aveniu. Called salvation because at 1898 King George and his wife Olga lived after a attempted to murder them both in that place.
